Package pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.worlds

Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.worlds.GameWorld
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
FinalLevelWorld, NormalLevel
public abstract class GameWorld extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
GameWorld is a container to contain all GameObjects. GameObject shall update in GameWorld.
Author:
YuyanZhou
